item.title: Automation with Selenium,Junit, Ant
item.description: Much of the technologies above do not or will not need an introduction if you already know them or can read them from the links above. More over today’s article is more about how we can use all the three selenium, ant and junit to come up with an automated solution for regressive testing. Please refer to the documentation links above for the basic knowledge on any of the used tools.
